description: This file defines a React functional component 'App' that manages a theme toggle between light and dark modes. It includes UI elements such as a button to switch themes, an image logo, and links, with state management handled via React hooks.

methods.name: App
methods.description: React functional component that renders the application's main UI with theme toggle functionality.

methods.name: toggleTheme
methods.description: Function to toggle the theme state between 'light' and 'dark'.
